comment:
* @hide
 * @deprecated in API 16
 * The Texture View for a graphics renderscript (RenderScriptGL)
 * to draw on.
 *

methods.name: public void onSurfaceTextureAvailable(SurfaceTexture surface, int width, int height)
public void onSurfaceTextureSizeChanged(SurfaceTexture surface, int width, int height)
public void pause()
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
     * Inform the view that the activity is paused. The owner of this view must
     * call this method when the activity is paused. Calling this method will
     * pause the rendering thread.
     * Must not be called before a renderer has been set.

methods.name: public void resume()
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
     * Inform the view that the activity is resumed. The owner of this view must
     * call this method when the activity is resumed. Calling this method will
     * recreate the OpenGL display and resume the rendering
     * thread.
     * Must not be called before a renderer has been set.

methods.name: public RenderScriptGL createRenderScriptGL(RenderScriptGL.SurfaceConfig sc)
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
     * Create a new RenderScriptGL object and attach it to the
     * TextureView if present.
     *
     *
     * @param sc The RS surface config to create.
     *
     * @return RenderScriptGL The new object created.

methods.name: public void destroyRenderScriptGL()
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
     * Destroy the RenderScriptGL object associated with this
     * TextureView.

methods.name: public void setRenderScriptGL(RenderScriptGL rs)
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
     * Set a new RenderScriptGL object.  This also will attach the
     * new object to the TextureView if present.
     *
     * @param rs The new RS object.

methods.name: public RenderScriptGL getRenderScriptGL()
methods.comment:
* @deprecated in API 16
     * Returns the previously set RenderScriptGL object.
     *
     * @return RenderScriptGL

methodNames: public void onSurfaceTextureAvailable(SurfaceTexture surface, int width, int height)
public void onSurfaceTextureSizeChanged(SurfaceTexture surface, int width, int height)
